channel.title: Two Things
channel.description:
Hello,
I would like to request 'help' on two things:
#1 - I am horrible with object handlers and was hoping that someone could create me an entire gate handler (This meaning all gates work and are able to open/close).
And #2 - Since the source I downloaded came already with a shitty written Tutorial Island I was hoping someone could also help me in rewriting the tutorial island complete (meaning it is atleast 95%+).
I do not really have any other incentives to offer other than a free moderator/administrator position on my server once it is release.
Please add me on Skype or message me on here if you're interested in helping me out.
Skype- Kj97r2

item.title: Two Things
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

There is a realy good tutorial released here on moparscape for tutorial island.
Just say what is wrong and il try to fix for ya

Read full topic

item.title: Two Things

item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

_Llezrek:

I am horrible with object handlers

doesn’t even make sense

_Llezrek:

was hoping that someone could create me an entire gate handler (This meaning all gates work and are able to open/close)

you’re funny

_Llezrek:

someone could also help me in rewriting the tutorial island complete

Anyone here is willing to help you, no one is going to do it for you though. What exactly do you need help with?
